title: How to Get the Fun Out of Garry's Mod Online

steps.headline: Buy Garry's Mod 13 if you don't already own it.
steps.description: You can buy it on Steam for $9.99. http://store.steampowered.com/app/4000/

steps.headline: Find a server you may like try out and play.
steps.description: You can also find many other different game modes to play.

steps.headline: Learn how to play the type of game mode the server is hosting.
steps.description: Some servers have a "MOTD" that appears when you first connect that can explain how the game works.

steps.headline: Try to meet new people and make friends.
steps.description: Having friends to play Garry's Mod makes it a more enjoyable experience. Every player you meet is different, some players may be nice and friendly while some may not be as friendly to new players.

steps.headline: Try to earn some of Garry's Mods Steam achievements.
steps.description: Achievements serve no direct purpose in Garry's Mod, but they can be fun to earn! Playing in a Sandbox server can help speed up the process of earning an achievement. You even get an achievement for playing multiplayer for the first time.

steps.headline: Explore the vast amount of multiplayer servers Garry's Mod has to offer.
steps.description: Many servers support the same game modes, but usually offer a unique experience. You can find game modes ranging from casual role play type games, to fast paced death match.

text: Buy Garry's Mod 13 if you don't already own it. You can buy it on Steam for $9.99. http://store.steampowered.com/app/4000/ Find a server you may like try out and play. You can also find many other different game modes to play. Learn how to play the type of game mode the server is hosting. Some servers have a "MOTD" that appears when you first connect that can explain how the game works. Try to meet new people and make friends. Having friends to play Garry's Mod makes it a more enjoyable experience. Every player you meet is different, some players may be nice and friendly while some may not be as friendly to new players. Try to earn some of Garry's Mods Steam achievements. Achievements serve no direct purpose in Garry's Mod, but they can be fun to earn! Playing in a Sandbox server can help speed up the process of earning an achievement. You even get an achievement for playing multiplayer for the first time. Explore the vast amount of multiplayer servers Garry's Mod has to offer. Many servers support the same game modes, but usually offer a unique experience. You can find game modes ranging from casual role play type games, to fast paced death match.
